inn1.comm: and the first ball is bang on target, curling in full for the stumps, Chibhabha jams down his bat in time on it
back of a length, leg-sidish, nudged to square
lovely back-foot punch, nothing much wrong with this short of a length ball outside off, Chibhabha has a firm base on the crease and pushes it firmly down the ground, past mid off's dive
played out towards midwicket
stays on the crease, lets this back of a length ball come on, and pushes to covers
beaten as he goes half-heartedly after a short and wide one that keeps leaving him on the angle
nippy length ball, comes in a bit from outside off, he chops it to point for a single
floats it up and it swings in late, Chibhabha gets behind the line and drives nicely to mid off
lets it come in from a length, opens up and plays softly to the leg side
playing from the crease again as Yamin swings it back in towards off again, defends it back to the bowler
now he decides to do something different, walks out, but is not comfortable with the inswing, and jabs it behind square to get off strike
goes straightish this time, but is far outside off too and is left comfortably
rises from short of a length, he plays it softly, and even as it pops up, it is well short of cover
lovely, much fuller this time, excellent line just outside off, Chibhabha has a go at the drive, and is beaten
lets it be this time, a good length ball leaving the right hander slightly, and he shoulders arms
width this time on a full delivery, he gets the drive between cover and backward point, the ball is stopped near the rope eventually
much more comfortable on the back foot as he punches a short of a length ball firmly past extra cover
rides the bounce on a lifter as it comes slowly off the pitch, and works it past the man at short leg
short and wide, there to be hit, but Chibhabha misses the attempted cut
turns this good length ball to square leg
angled in, brushes the pad and goes to the keeper down the leg side
well bowled, pitches it up and gets it to move in a bit, on off and middle, Chibhabha closes the bat face as he pushes awkwardly in front of square leg
played back to the bowler
stays on the crease and punches a length ball to the left of mid off
outside edge as he fends at a lifter, but it runs past slip and third man is not able to stop it with a poor effort, Wahab letting the slip through
overpitched ball outside off, driven straight to mid off, hit it hard into the ground
bouncer, slanted across, good line, Chibhabha ducks
moves across and defends a good length ball
wants to drive one slanted across him, but bat face closes and he ends up mishitting to midwicket for one
lots of width, he waits on it and makes sure he picks the gap between cover and point, Shehzad is after it, he puts in a dive too, but the ball has hit the rope just before
walks across outside off stump, and calmly pats a length ball down the track
tighter line as he slants it in fullish, it is whipped with a thick inside edge to long leg
good line again as he gets it come in from a good length, just outside off, left alone
loose as he drives a length ball airily on the up without moving the feet much, fortunately it travels wide of cover
driven solidly off the front foot to extra cover
causes trouble first ball with his extra pace, Mutumbami was hoping to avoid this shortish ball but it hasn't climbed that much and pinged him on the left glove
excellent line, close to off, good length, but Mutumbami is spot-on with the leave
short of a good length around off, nudged from the crease square on the leg side
turns this short of a length ball off the pad through square leg, and they push for the second by the time the fielder runs in from the deep
shoulders arms to let a good length ball pass outside off
plays from the crease, opens the face on a good length ball and runs it to backward point
appeal for run-out, Chibhabha came out and whipped a full delivery to square leg, was a long way down the track before he turned back, but the dive has saved him
tossed up and angled in, again he comes out, but this time he misses and is hit on the pad
quickish length ball hurrying along towards off, defended to the bowler
down the track once more to push it to long off, he wasn't to the pitch of the ball but handled it alright in the end
straightens on the pad, is tucked fine, Irfan dives in the ring to keep them to one
comes in with the angle and bounces, he works it to vacant midwicket
shortish and skiddy, Chibhabha responds with quick hands on the pull, gets it past a diving midwicket and it trickles into the rope
taps a short of a length ball behind point and the single is on
tight line just outside off on a good length, left alone
middle and leg line on this length ball and it is wristily turned past square leg
beaten on the inside edge as he prods at a good length ball, again on a tight line close to off
some width on a length ball which is sent down to third man
on the front foot, bat in front of pad, to defend softly
straightish and quick, he pushes forward, to covers
takes on the fuller length, isn;t quite to the pitch but swings so cleanly that it clears the wide long-on boundary
slanted in and carries down the leg side
dropped, Wahab Riaz the man at deep square leg, it was swept and flat straight to him, he went down on his knees, set himself up and clanged it
walks out, bowler shortens the length and it bounces extra, hits the pad
hit down to long on for a single
Wahab goes past the edge again, Chibhabha caught on the crease and wafting at a climbing ball leaving him
wants to work it through midwicket but cannot get it past Wahab as he rushes to his right to stop it
tentatively nudges this length ball off a thick inside edge in front of square
right on middle stump, short of a length, tucked to midwicket
beaten again, as he follows a short and wide one
overpitched outside off, he gets down on his knee and drives, picks out backward point
opens the face to a tossed up ball and pushes it wide of cover
shortish, slapped away to sweeper cover
comes in quickly with the angle, he is standing on the crease and keeps it out
sees a bit of flight on a pitched up ball and slog-sweeps it to the deep midwicket rope, a clean hit again from Mutumbami
chops one from close to off stump to short third man
quickish length ball on off, defended
fullish and angled in a tad, turned through midwicket off the front foot
flighted, just outside off, defended
tight line again outside off, played back to the bowler
full length delivery whipped down to long on
comes forward and works it with the spin to square leg
slightly short, turns in, and is nudged behind square
defends a short of a length ball
pitched up outside off, he reaches forward to push to mid off
turns this off his pads down to fine leg
overpitched on middle and leg, and Mutumbami has nicely clipped it past midwicket, superb timing, beating the fielder's dive near the rope
attacks the full length outside off, but mishits it to mid off, was in the air for a bit but safe
comes up with a sharp lifter, leaving the batsman hopping, he does well to keep the wrists down though
leans well forward to push to midwicket
another forward stretch to defend a flighted ball to the leg side
fuller length, he pushes it solidly but finds midwicket once more
flights it more now, and this time he drives it to long off to get off strike
bowled slower, nudged to square leg
starts by banging it in, it is climbing outside off, he reacts by getting on his toes and flashing it to the fine third man rope
Irfan responds with another one that takes off, Mutumbami jerks inside the line a bit late, but just in time, and again his wrists are down
pacy delivery jabbed awkwardly to square leg, Sarfraz tells Irfan that he wants more of the same from him
in the slot for the pull this time, not too much awkward bounce, and he hits it well in front of square
delivers a full toss which is pushed out to the sweeper
whoa, Mutumbami is on the ground, and his helmet has gone flying off his head as he ducks into this sharp Irfan lifter, that cut back in, made it harder for Mutumbami to avoid it
flighted on and around off stump, lunges forward to block into the leg side
keeps back to push a short of a length ball into the covers
good shot, but straight to point. Sized up the short ball early, backed away and flayed at it. Just couldn't pick the gap
leans into a drive to long-on and gets off strike
picks it off his knees, but square leg is quite alert. Rizwan over there, diving to his right
flighted on off stump, blunted
mid-on was up, the ball was a tad overpitched and Chibhabha says thank you very much. Plants his front leg down and launches the ball over Yamin's head
good length ball on middle and leg, clipped to deep midwicket
short ball, but it barely comes up to waist high. It is the cross-seamed delivery as well. Mutumbami was on the pull, perhaps a touch too early, and gets it right on the bottom
length ball, slapped through the covers. Mutumbami is not backing down. Solid front foot stride and excellent power through the shot
skips down the track, but Yamin has spotted the batsman's intentions and shortened his length. The ball was coming in after pitching as well, cramping the batsman up and keeping him quiet
slugs a full delivery from outside off stump to mid-on. Poor timing that time
good length ball on off stump, safely defended
nudged off the pads to deep midwicket, as he waits in the crease for the ball to turn. Deftly done
tossed up on and around off stump, blocked
loopy delivery inviting the batsman to drive, and he does to long-on
gets to the pitch of a flighted offspinner outside off and nurdles it to short midwicket
stays back to a flatter delivery, which seems to skid on a touch. Chibhabha is able to adjust and flicks it to deep midwicket
back of a length and on fourth stump, Chibhabha pats it back to the bowler
good length ball on middle, Chibhabha uses his bottom-hand strength to push it past the diving short midwicket
good running! He placed the drive to the left of cover and set off straight away. The pressure on the fielder then told as he fumbled
stands up tall and swats a short delivery outside off to deep point
fuller delivery on off stump, defended stoutly
gets forward to a good length ball on off stump and pings it to short cover
just a hint of turn for Bilal, which makes the cover drive become an inside edge onto pad. Lovely, slow pace from the offie
gets forward to try and reach the pitch, didn't quite make it, but plays with the turn to short midwicket

closes the face too early! It's the slower pace from Bilal again that does the trick. As does the slight lack of turn on this occasion. It was tossed up, a good way outside off, Chibhabha was well forward and was looking for a little tuck through midwicket. Only as he looks up, he watches the ball lob back to the bowler. Two short of fifty for Chibhabha and he knows it. Walks off banging a fist onto his helmet
goes back to the flatter delivery and works it to short midwicket
tossed up outside off, Chari is forward with a defensive bat. "Lovely bowling," says captain Sarfraz
good length ball just a shade outside off stump, Chari is back with a block
looks to charge, but Yamin has adjusted his length again and keeps Mutumbami to a nudge into the leg side. Goes back to his crease and down on his haunches. Remember, he did cop a pretty scary blow
straying on the pads and he whips it away to the left of short fine leg
opens the face to slice a good length ball outside off to deep third man
got into the shot too early. It was short and wide, asking to be smashed. Only Mutumbami was a shade too eager. Bunts it to cover
heaves it away! One-bounce four to deep midwicket Top shot! Played with the angle into him, took advantage of the fuller length and swung through the line. Excellent batting
back of a length on off stump, tapped to short midwicket

eesh, seems a touch too early in his innings to get cheeky. But at least he has got the single and returned the strike to the set batsman. Goes for a lap sweep to a seriously tossed up delivery outside off, and inside edges to short fine leg
tossed up outside off, defended into the leg side
leans forward to the pitch of the ball and drives to long-on
rolls his wrists to adjust to the fact that he did not get to the pitch of a ball outside off, and clips to long-on
good, solid sweep from Mutumbami. Picked the length ball, planted his front leg outside off to put the lbw out of the way, and rolls his wrists to keep the ball down
whipped to deep square leg to bring up the hundred

traps him! Poor decision to go back in his crease. Struck on the back foot, in line with leg stump, simple call for the umpire. It was full, it was a dart. Hardly an spin there. Chari has just misjudged this
starts off with a sweep against the left-arm spinning bowling into him with the angle, single to long leg
tossed up on middle and leg, Mutumbami turns it to midwicket
pushed through a lot quicker, and flatter. Mutumbami keeps back and blocks. Nicely done
dart strays down leg, picked away to the left of short fine leg
looks for the sweep again, but this flighted delivery was just a bit outside off to connect
flighted outside off, Mutumbami steps forward to block
waits on a good length ball on middle and turns it to the left of the wicketkeeper
loopy delivery on and around middle, tucked around the corner to square leg
gets down the track to whip a flighted delivery from outside off to midwicket. Shehzad pulls out a dive to his right and saves the single
so he places the ball straighter and finds a single to long-on

beautifully done! He has eased down the track, and managed to not to signal his intentions too early too. So Imad cannot adjust and continues bowling the flighted delivery outside off. Williams lofts it to the long-on boundary
flighted just outside off, driven to cover
pushed through on middle and leg, Mutumbami goes for a sweep but does not connect
good length ball outside off, driven to cover

lovely shot, threads it through the covers to get the two he needs to secure a second ODI fifty. Quicker delivery, but had a bit of width and he powered it away. Pretty resilient innings, and ZImbabwe's chances rest on him making it big
good length ball just outside off, pushed to long-off
picked away off his pads to square leg
loads of flight, but that helps the batsman as he comes down the track and drives to long-on
good length ball on and around off stump, defended

another caught and bowled! Seemed like Williams was in two minds - whether to whip the ball away or curb the instinct and in the end he does neither. Lunged forward to a flighted delivery outside off and pops a leading edge back to the bowler
flighted delivery just outside off, leans forward to defend

two in the over and Chigumbura bags a duck! Zimbabwe are faltering badly here. This was a simple, good length delivery just a shade outside off stump. The batsman is uncertain again. Should I play, should I leave? He plants an open face down with no conviction behind it and the ball just slides off the inside half and onto the stumps
starts off by charging the spinner, who shortens his length and keeps it to a block
at the other end, Mutumbami is batting like a dream. Picks up the length ball, goes down on one knee and launches the ball into the crowd way way beyond square leg
pushed through, the arm ball that, but Mutumbami keeps it out by virtue of being on the front foot
misjudges the pace there - it was a bit too quick for the sweep. Gets an inside edge to square leg
pushed through again on middle and leg, defended
some turn now, as Imad strives to put as many revs on it as he can. Raza opens the face and runs it to backward point
driven gently to long-off
this is short and Raza whips his body around as he plays the short-armed pull to long leg
drags a loopy delivery from way outside off to deep midwicket. Seems like he likes the sweep. A lot

bowled while playing the sweep! Going outside off to put the lbw out of the way is good, but you can't lunge that far across. Showed off almost all three stumps and once he failed to make contact, he was a goner. Flatter delivery skirts past him and clatters into middle and leg
flighted just outside off, defended
shimmies down the track to try and get to the pitch of a loopy delivery outside off and turns it to midwicket
clips the length ball off his pads to long leg
nervous little prod outside off, and Mutumbodzi gets an inside edge to long leg
goes for the on-the-up drive, and is a little too early with it. The slightly back of a length delivery seems to hold in the pitch and come on slower. Dot ball into the covers results
this one zips through before he could get the angled bat down in time. Back of a length delivery going across the right-hander, Mutumbami was looking for a single to third man. No luck
stays back as Wahab bowls short and in the corridor, guided to the right of deep third man
beaten outside off! For pace, and with the angle. Mutumbodzi is caught in the crease as he tries to block the good length ball. Plays down the wrong line
does better that time as he guides the back of a length delivery behind point

almost another caught and bowled! Bilal had to move in the opposite direction to his followthrough and dive to his right. Stuck out a hand, but he cannot reach. Lovely bowling though, as he duped the batsman with his flight
and again! The batsman was rushing at him, but he gets the ball to dip and bounce before he could reach the pitch. Inside edge onto pad wanders away towards third man
leans forward to a flighted ball outside off and blocks

there is his fifth! This may have stayed a touch low, because it was short and asking to be cut. Mutumbodzi was going for it. Even backed away in case there was some turn. And there was. Just that it did not bounce as high enough, perhaps took a little inside egde and clatters into the stumps
tossed up just outside off, defended
slid off the open face to deep third man, Wahab continues bowling back of a length
goes for the bouncer, a sharp and very accurate one. Waller does not have the time he needs to sort it out. Tried to fend it away and gets a little glove towards the off side
banged in short again, but it is leagues down the leg side. No interest from the batsman
banged in on middle and leg, nudged behind short leg
thick outside edge, but there is no slip in place. Even the set batsman Mutumbami was not keen on getting in line with these quick deliveries from Wahab
tucks him up with another short ball, and Waller manages to blunt the ball past short leg
another short ball down the leg side
short and pushed across the right-hander, Mutumbami sways away from it and tries the upper cut. Does not connect
pokes his bat at a back of a length delivery skirting across him, gets a thick outside edge past the wicketkeeper and gets back for a couple
short and outside off, dabbed to point
short and wide outside off, Mutumbami looks for more runs to third man but cannot connect

caught behind going for the pull. Mutumbami walks back slapping the turf with his bat. This is the short ball's doing, Pakistan have been trying that for a while now. Having once tried an upper cut, this time he looks to drag the ball into the leg side and pays for his misjudgment. Another mistake in shot selection, and that means it is also drinks
a good length ball starting just outside leg, defended tightly
back of a length, outside off, softly guided through point
overpitched outside off stump and driven nicely through the covers
hit on the left shoulder as he tries to duck under this short ball, some of them have not risen as much as the batsmen expected
cut away in the air down to third man
short of a good length ball played behind point off a thick outside edge
walks across to off stump and punches a short of a length ball to point
length ball left alone outside the off stump
beaten, another one lifts from short of a length, he tries to punch and is done by some away movement and the angle
a length ball tapped in the direction of point
moves a long way across outside off and watches this widish ball go past
sees it bowled fuller and attacks it, lifting it in the air straight down the ground
walks across in to a full toss and pushes it straight to cover

another one goes to a spinner, Imad Wasim comes back and strikes immediately, Waller tries to turn this slanted delivery to leg with the incoming angle, he does not keep it down though, and Hafeez tumbles forward to take a low catch at midwicket
big shout for leg before but the umpire says no, was sliding down leg with all the angle
plumb this time, Wasim darts it in on a good length, Panyangara is pinned on the crease, and is struck in front of middle and leg before his bat can come down
played out to point
beaten by a flat one outside off as he tries to dab it past slip
defended off a thick inside edge to the leg side
short and wide from Irfan and Jongwe dispatches that between cover and backward point with a crisp cut
shorter and wide now, climbing high outside off, he reaches for it and helps it in the air wide of third man
back of a length, softly played out to gully
Jongwe gives Irfan the charge, moves to the leg side and slices a length ball high over wide mid off to pick up a couple
Irfan responds with a bouncer, Jongwe crouches and allows it to pass over him
a length ball around off to end with, Jongwe taps it in the direction of point and trots out, but is not getting the single
pushes a length ball down the ground to long on
Nyumbu jumps out, this comes in after pitching, and he escapes with a thick inside edge
down the track again and pushes it this time through midwicket for two
opens the face and runs it to short third man
works it in front of square on the leg side
bends forward low and squeezes it to short third man
almost pops this full ball back to the bowler, out of Malik's reach to his left in the end
tossed up ball on the stumps, worked to square leg
jumps out to a flighted ball and picks up another single to long on

Rizwan ends the innings with a superb take at backward square leg, Nyumbu went for the lap sweep to a full ball on middle, got it in the air to Rizwan's right, he went flying to take it with both hands

inn2.comm: a touch too straight and Shehzad shuffles to clip it through to deep square leg
back of a length and just outside off, tapped towards point
full and sliding down, Asif picks it away behind square leg. Off the mark with both runs and wickets today
good length ball outside off, not bothered with
fuller delivery outside off, driven to mid-off
fuller delivery outside off, defended

dropped at first slip by Nyumbu. Asif flashes at a fuller ball wide outside off, results in a thick outside edge and carries quite cleanly. About waist high and asking the fielder to move to his right a bit, but it is not accepted
back of a length and outside off, Asif is almost tempted but memories of the last ball arrive in time to make him leave it
shortish and outside off again, tapped to point

falls just short of Williams racing in from the deep third man boundary. Full steam ahead it seems for Asif, whatever happens. This time he looks to wallop a length ball over the off side, but it is too wide for him to time properly. Outside edge nearly carries
good length ball on off stump, defended
good length ball on middle and off, nudged to midwicket
straying down leg, Shehzad deflects it away to long leg
oooh, misjudges a slower ball there. Just saw it short and goes for the pull well before it has reached him. Gets an inside edge onto pad. Lucky not to drag on
fuller delivery on off stump, pushed to mid-on
does better with the pull this time, getting under the short ball and sending the ball fine. Long leg is in place though
full on off stump, pushed down the ground
plays away from his body to push a short of a length delivery into the covers
fumble behind the stumps by the part-time keeper. This is a very full inswinger that beats the inside edge of Shehzad while he was looking for a cover drive. Large gap between bat and pad exploited
a stump-to-stump delivery means Shehzad can just wait for it and pick it away through midwicket
length ball thumped down the ground. Just the right ball for the kind of mood Asif is in. Throws his bat at it and times it very well too
oh, that is lovely. Checked himself and trusted his timing. Full and rather wide outside off, but Asif has watched it all the way onto his bat and sliced it behind point
banged in short, but there is barely enough threat on it. Asif swivels on his back foot, takes it off his waist and pulls to long leg
full (and slower) on off stump, Asif adjusts and presents a straight bat
back of a length and outside off, punched back to the bowler
just back of a length on off stump, Asif is caught on the crease but manages to defend with soft hands and an open face

picks up a short ball and smashes it to the square leg boundary. He was on the front foot so the shot did look a little awkward. The ball travels quite a way in the air, but he has managed to place it well wide of the deep fielder
inside edge off the slower ball! Lucky that his stumps are still standing. Asif was looking for the on-the-up push down the ground, but he is into the shot too early
good length ball on off stump, defended
short and wide, sliced close enough to point for the fielder to stop it
down the track, but Shehzad still can't get to the pitch. So he adjusts and blocks
some turn, which ruins the cut shot. Shehzad had already made some room to smash it away. But that ends up backfiring on him as he gets too far away from the ball and bunts it into the covers
good length ball on middle, defended
clears the front leg and smears a flatter delivery to cover
fired in down the leg side, should be called wide, and Chari behinds the stumps fumbles again
some turn, some bounce, the batsman is beaten. Pitches outside off, gets the batsman chasing after it, but is too good to get bat to. Shehzad is not looking quite comfortable out there just yet.
pushed through down leg and Asif has done quite well to keep back and clip the ball past leg gully
tossed up outside off, Shehzad half thought about the clip through midwicket, but prefers a straight bat. A lot of Zimbabwe batsmen got caught and bowled off similar deliveries
good sweep shot. Lunges forward and across to power the ball away to deep square leg
flighted just outside off, defended
stays back to a reasonably fuller delivery and nudges it to short midwicket
tossed up outside off, defended
misses out on a short and wide ball. Set up for the pull but has mistimed it to mid-on
round-armed in on middle and leg, Shehzad clips it through midwicket
flighted on middle and off, Asif has waited for it and nudges it to square leg
sweet timing again. Terrible ball, yes. Short and slanted down leg, but Asif has clipped it wonderfully to deep midwicket
tossed up just outside off, Shehzad drives past short extra cover
defends a loopy delivery on middle and that will be lunch
shortish offbreak worked to square leg with the spin, some bounce there
worked in front of square, past a diving midwicket
on the front foot to defend softly
short ball spins down leg as he misses the pull
sees him coming out and bowls it wider, he reaches out and thumps it to mid off
stays on the back foot now and defends to covers
turns it off his pads to backward square
wants to paddle it from outside off but does not get hold of it, the ball rolls on to the pitch
shortish, he has width but picks out point with the cut
comes in with the angle and is pulled to deep midwicket, who misfields
stays a tad low as he tries to attack it, and ends up under edging it down the track
taps it in front of mid on and sets of immediately, turning it into a comfortable single
comes on to the front foot and blocks
comes down the track, he shortens the length and Shehzad has to defend
floats it up wide outside off, Shehzad goes after it and is beaten
lets it spin in and works it square on leg for one
goes big and goes down the ground, gets front leg out of the way, makes some room down leg and whacks it high and straight
worked with the spin to square leg
big one, Bilal charges out, Nyumbu tries to put him off track by bowling it wider, but Bilal has it covered as he hammers it way over deep midwicket
a thick outside edge this time as he tries to go through extra cover, long chase for short third man
left alone outside off stump
pulls a shortish delivery to wide mid on
has some width but places the ball straight to cover
flighted low full toss, he bends for the sweep and hits it to the vacant deep backward square leg boundary
not sure whether to sweep or pull, bit of a slog-sweep in the end as he hits it square from outside off, Bilal has to hurry on the second
beaten outside off as he tries to run it past slip
again he makes some room outside leg, is free to swing his arms, and crashes a flighted ball through the point region
change of angle works right away, Bilal puts front foot out and has a swing again, Mutombodzi makes good ground to his left at long-on and dives to take it
takes a big stride forward and defends it to the bowler
Hafeez gets off the mark, but had the field interested, skipped down the track and forced this in the air, clearing mid off comfortably in the end
Nyumbu shortens the length, Hafeez is waiting in the crease as he cuts it dismissively to the third man boundary
through extra cover, where the fielder takes pace off the ball and it slows down near the rope
walks down the track and pushes to short extra cover
angled in quickish, he lets it come in and turns it to leg
punched off the back foot to short extra cover
tucked off the pad to deep forward square leg
opens the face and guides it behind square, but not out of the reach of backward point
taps it to leg off the front foot and trots out, but bowler prevents the single
walks out and across to off stump, turns a good length ball towards square leg
nicely guides this one outside off to third man
good length, on off stump, he dead-bats it off the front foot
in the air, but lands around the middle of the pitch, he was moving forward but this one held up and bounced more
takes it from around off and works it with the angle behind square
whips a low full toss to the right of deep midwicket
eases down the track and caresses it to cover, where there is a diving stop
defended off the front foot to the bowler
leaves the crease once more but this one comes in with the angle and is hit on the pad
bends forward low to defend to the off side
fuller and flighted, pushed to extra cover
a bit late in coming forward to this pitched up ball and mistimes the push to mid on
pushes softly to the left of mid on and rushes for the single, throw misses any way
caught down the leg side, dug in short, angled in, Hafeez has a go at it, and gloves it to the keeper
right forward to defend a length ball
attacks a length ball outside off, and inside edges it square on the leg side
steps forward and guides this length ball to point
down the track to a flighted ball and takes a hand off the bat as he defends
stretches forward to defend to off
slanted fullish into the pad, nudged behind square
gets on to the front foot and defends a tossed up ball
drives an overpitched ball but cover dives to stop it
turn there from just outside off and it beats the outside edge on the forward push
hits this pitched up delivery with a bit of a closed face, down to wide long on
gets forward and pushes to short extra
turns this length ball in front of square
bouncer slanted too much down the leg side
another bouncer and batsman ducks safely
tries to force a slowish delivery through the leg side, ends up popping it in the air, but well short of mid on
cramped for room with this short of a length ball around off, forces it to mid on
short ball not rising too much, Shafiq pulls hard, wide of deep midwicket
opens up and swat-pulls a short ball to deep midwicket
leans forward and pushes with the spin to short extra cover
short and wide, Raza;s dive at extra cover prevents the boundary, this was hit fiercely
leaves the crease and taps it to midwicket
short and wide once more, this time the cut is right in the gap between cover and extra cover
length ball on the pad worked behind square
thumps a widish length ball on the up, straight to short extra cover
clips a full one with the incoming angle to short midwicket
drives airily, but wide of short extra cover, to mid off
full on middle, turned in the gap between midwicket and mid on
stays on the crease and punches this length ball on the up to the left of mid off
pushes in front of mid off and takes on the throw for a tight single, throw misses
short ball played out to midwicket
skips out, takes it on the full and clips it past midwicket
rocks back and punches a flat one to extra cover
tossed up ball driven past short extra, but the man on the edge of the circle dives to stop it
shortish ball darted in, stays low, Shafiq misses the pull, is hit on the pad, there is an appeal but he is struck way outside leg stump
turned in front of square leg for a couple
good length ball on the pad, he works it to square leg, non-striker is about half way through with the single before he turns around and scrambles back
shortish ball swung straight to short midwicket
overpitched ball squeezed to short extra cover now
slowish length ball around off, defended
has a mighty slog at this length ball, and a thick edge flies to the keeper's right
opens the face and runs a short of a length ball to third man
shortish ball, he rocks back but hits it to point
Shehzad's struggle is over, he's charged out looking to whip it to leg, but Williams has found some turn, Shehzad is stranded so far down he knows attempting to come back is futile, simple stumping
stretches forward to defend
tossed up full on the pad, turned to square leg, Malik is sent back rightly by Shafiq
good length ball played out off the back foot to covers
leans forward to one spinning away outside off and pushes to point
eases a good length ball to mid on
Shafiq escapes, edged this short of a length ball in the air as he tried to work it to leg, was in the air for a while as it went just past midwicket
good length ball comes in from outside off, defended off a thick inside edge to square leg
fullish, on off and middle, clipped to deep square
stretches right forward to smother a pitched up ball down the track
moves across, and defends this good length ball half-forward
wanted a couple after nurdling the ball around the corner, but deep square leg is quick enough and keeps it to a single
offers up a full toss, which Shafiq swipes away to deep midwicket
this time it is the short ball - clear signs of an inexperienced leggie still warming up - and Malik pulls strongly to deep midwicket
flighted just outside off, defended
pushed through on middle, Shafiq backs away and whips the ball to wide long-on
hits a good length on middle, and gets the ball to keep rather low. Malik was shaping to cut and gets an inside edge
quite full on off stump, Shafiq drills it to mid-on
waits for the good length ball to come to him, and then works it gently to deep square leg. Hit it softly and wide of deep square leg to nab a couple
does it off the front foot this time. Excellent control with the wrists as he beats midwicket inside the circle. Deep square leg has a lot of ground to cover again
head right over the ball as he blocks on middle and off
deceived by the slower ball. It was the legcutter, to which  Shafiq was closing the face. Leading edge wanders into the covers
back of a length and just outside off, pushed into the covers. That will be drinks as well
short and turning away, which means he has the room he needs to free his arms. Pulled away strongly to the deep midwicket boundary
short again, and Malik launches another pull. This time straight at deep square leg
leans into a pretty little cover drive, but Zimbabwe have men patrolling the deep
stays low again and Malik, who was prepping for another have, ends up mistiming the ball down the pitch

lbw appeal. This was flighted and angled into leg stump, considering the batsman was winding up again, he is a little late in bring the bat down and blocking the ball. Struck on the front pad, but it would have gone down leg
top shot! Malik has decided its time to finish this. Stays beside the ball and lifts it over extra cover. Mutumbodzi not having the best time out there. Offering freebies left, right and centre
good length ball on off stump, defended off the open face
fuller delivery outside off, driven to mid-off
slower, quite full as well, but on leg stump. Shafiq gives it direction and picks up a couple to long leg
shortish on middle and leg, Shafiq nudges it in front of square leg
waits on the shortish delivery and picks it away to midwicket
good length ball on off stump, defended
much better. He had the batsman reaching in front and away from his body, meaning he had slowed it down and flighted the ball quite nicely.
but the follow up is appalling. Half-tracker, which Malik has dismissed over the midwicket fence.
flighted just outside off, Malik leans forward to block
hits a good length, but has drifted a bit too far down leg. Malik tickles it to short fine leg
diving effort at extra cover has probably saved a boundary. Raza helps the bowler out, especially seeing as this was a short ball and was cut quite fiercely
leans into a push to long-off as Mutumbodzi finds the right length as well. Nicely tossed up and outside off
plays around his front pad and gets hit in front of leg stump, but the ball would have gone down. Zimbabwe don't even appeal
too straight and Shafiq helps himself with a neat little leg glance. Gets inside the line of it a touch and rolls his wrists to ensure it goes very fine
some cut back into the batsman, which is why Shafiq adjusts from playing an on-the-up drive to a checked push. Quick single to mid-off
full and outside off, driven to mid-off
picks up a short of a length ball and pummels it to the midwicket boundary. Powerful strike. Anybody else getting the feeling Malik feels he has unfinished business?
another short ball, which Malik guides to the fine leg boundary. Swiveled on his back leg, the front lifting off the ground, and pulled it away
loopy full toss outside off, punched to long-on
flatter on off stump, tapped to long-on again
some turn, but it happens after the ball was pitched short. So Shafiq can ride it and secure a single to deep square leg
pushed through on middle and was full enough too. Malik, though, has kept back and has to adjust with his hands
brilliant strike! Backs away from a short ball and slaps it through extra cover. Lovely batting against spin
looks for the cut again, but ends up with an inside edge
stars with a full toss, that is met, oddly enough, with the outside edge. Shafiq was lunging forward for a cover drive but ends up playing inside the line
flighted outside off, turned to midwicket
pushed to long-on and Pakistan are a run closer
good length ball wide outside off, not bothered with
flighted just outside off, defended
keeps out the good length ball turning in at him from off stump
serenely driven to long-on
stays back and picks the ball wide of long-on now
full toss, which Malik gently taps to deep midwicket
short and wide outside off, Shafiq slices it to cover
whipped away to midwicket, who is up now with only one to get
pats it to cover point, yells "yes" and secures the single that wins Pakistan the game and the series
